settings.title: 20% OFF
settings.subtitle:
We Appreciate Your Service!

Active Military, Veterans, First Responders, Nurses, Teachers Hospital Staff, and Government Employees are eligible for our sitewide discount.

settings.title: Supporting Those Who Contribute!
settings.text: The brave nurses, doctors, first responders, teachers, government employees, veterans, and members of the armed forces make a difference in our lives every day, and we want to make a difference in their lives too. They can recreate their favorite 5-star experience at home with fragrances inspired by the world’s finest hotels and enjoy 20% off their order at hotelcollection.com.

settings.question: What Is ID.Me?
settings.answer: An identity verification service that verifies your affiliation with different organizations.

settings.question: How Do I Create An ID.Me Account?
settings.answer:
Register for an account at shop.id.me. Contact the ID.me Support team if you need assistance accessing
your account.

settings.question: Is my discount combinable with other discounts?
settings.answer: The ID.me discount cannot be combined with any other promotion or discount.

settings.question: Who can apply?
settings.answer:
Discounts are available to the following groups:

Troop ID
Active Duty
Inactive Reserves
National Guard
Veterans
Retirees
First Responder ID – You are eligible for First Responder ID if any of the below segments apply to you (active or retired):
Police Officer
Sheriff
State Trooper
Firefighter
Veterans
Retirees
EMS/EMT
Nurse
Advanced Registered Nurse Practitioner (ARNP)
Registered Nurse (RN)
Licensed Practical Nurse (PN/LPN)
Advanced Practice Registered Nurse (APRN)
Certified Registered Nurse Anesthetist (CRNA)
Certified Clinical Nurse Specialist (CNS)
Certified Nursing Assistant
Certified Nurse Midwife
Certified Nurse Practitioner
Teacher
Certified Teacher
Certified Teacher Aide
Certified Teaching Assistant
Certified Educational Assistant
Lifetime Teaching Credential Holders
College/University Professors
School Administration
Government Employees
Federal Government Employees
State Government Employees
Local Government Employees
